titleStmt.title: The characters, or, The manners of the age by Monsieur de la Bruyere ... made English by several hands ; with the characters of Theophrastus, translated from the Greek, and a prefatory discourse to them, by Monsieur de la Bruyere ; to which is added, a key to his Characters.
Caractères. English
titleStmt.author: La Bruyère, Jean de, 1645-1696.
Theophrastus. Characters. English.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Bullord and sold by Matt. Gilliflower ... Ben. Tooke ... Christopher Bateman ... and Richard Parker ...,

notesStmt.note: "The moral characters of Theophrastus" with special t.p. dated 1698.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
